short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a BlackJack copy that has some flaws, but I hope you enjoy it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Black Andreas is version of Blackjack, but you can't loose your actual money! Using this extension you can try to double your fictional money. This program could easily be used at school, and for nontechnical teachers this is untraceable. This extension should also track your progress, and give you some extra cash if you go broke.

Enjoy!




PS. Please get in contact if you find bugs. ðŸ˜€
